content: One unique experience you might be interested in is visiting the Komyo-in Temple for a night tour. This temple is open for tours exclusively at night, and offers a rare opportunity to experience its serene and historical atmosphere in a different light. During the tour, you'll learn about the temple's history and architecture, as well as listen to Buddhist sutras and meditation chants. The tour also includes a matcha tea ceremony and vegetarian Buddhist-style dinner, making it a unique and immersive cultural experience. Keep in mind that reservations are required and the tour is only available on select days, so be sure to plan accordingly.
